introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is "つづき", which you will often hear when talking about ongoing series, like in the context of watching a TV drama, reading a book, or discussing plans. For example, someone might say they can't wait to watch the "つづき" of an exciting show or read the "つづき" of a novel they've been enjoying.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "つづき" means continuation, sequence, or the rest. It's often used to refer to the next part of a story, ongoing events, or items following each other in order. You might encounter it when discussing episodes of a series or telling someone you want to hear the rest of a story.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 連続 : れんぞく : continuation
継続 : けいぞく : continuation
synonym_explanation:
The most common synonyms for "つづき" are: 
- "れんぞく" which emphasizes a consecutive order or sequence without interruption. 
- "けいぞく" which suggests carrying on with something or the continuation of a particular state or activity.
antonyms: 終了 : しゅうりょう : end
切れる : きれる : to break
antonym_explanation:
The most common antonyms of the word "つづき" are: 
- "しゅうりょう" which refers to the completion or end of something, noting that it marks the finality. 
- "きれる" which means to break or interrupt, often suggesting an unexpected or undesirable halt in the continuation.

collocations.kanji: 話のつづきを聞かせて
collocations.furigana: 話のつづきを聞かせて

example_sentences.kanji: このドラマの続きが気になる。
example_sentences.furigana: このドラマの続(つづ)きが気(き)になる。

translations.EN: I am curious about the continuation of this drama.
translations.ID: Saya penasaran dengan kelanjutan drama ini.
translations.ES: Me intriga la continuación de este drama.
translations.VI: Tôi tò mò về diễn biến tiếp theo của bộ phim này.
translations.FR: Je suis curieux de voir la suite de ce drama.
translations.NE: म यो नाटकको थप भागको बारेमा जिज्ञासु छु।
translations.BN: আমি এই নাটকের পরবর্তী অংশ সম্পর্কে কৌতূহলী।
translations.ZH: 我对这部剧的续集很感兴趣。
translations.TL: Interesado akong malaman ang susunod sa drama na ito.
translations.MY: ဒီဇာတ်လမ်းတွဲရဲ့အဆက်ကိုစိတ်ဝင်စားပါတယ်။
translations.HI: म इस ड्रामा की अगली कड़ी के बारे में उत्सुक हूँ।
translations.AR: أنا فضولي بشأن متابعة هذا المسلسل.
translations.FA: من به ادامه این درام علاقه مند هستم.

example_sentences.furigana: 話(はなし)の続(つづ)きを聞(き)かせて。

translations.EN: Please tell me the rest of the story.
translations.ES: Por favor cuéntame el resto de la historia.
translations.VI: Hãy kể cho tôi nghe phần còn lại của câu chuyện.
translations.FR: Veuillez me raconter la suite de l'histoire.
translations.NE: कृपया मसँग कथाको बाँकी भाग सुनाउनुहोस्।
translations.BN: অনুগ্রহ করে গল্পের বাকি অংশটি আমাকে শুনাও।
translations.ZH: 请告诉我故事的其余部分。
translations.TL: Pakiusap sabihin mo sa akin ang natitirang bahagi ng kwento.
translations.HI: कृपया कहानी की बाकी हिस्सा बताइए।
translations.FA: لطفاً بقیه داستان را برایم تعریف کن.

example_sentences.furigana: 明日(あした)の続(つづ)きは後(あと)で。

translations.EN: The continuation for tomorrow is later.
translations.ES: La continuación para mañana es más tarde.
translations.VI: Tiếp tục của ngày mai là sau đó.
translations.FR: La suite de demain sera plus tard.
translations.TL: Ang pagpapatuloy para sa bukas ay mamaya pa.
translations.MY: မနက်ဖြန်ထားပြီးနောက်ကျမှ ဆက်လက်လုပ်ပါမည်။
translations.HI: कल की जारी बात बाद में।

example_sentences.furigana: 続(つづ)きは次(じ)回(かい)です。

translations.EN: The continuation will be next time.
translations.ES: El resto será la próxima vez.
translations.VI: Phần tiếp theo sẽ vào lần sau.
translations.FR: La suite sera la prochaine fois.
translations.BN: আগামী বার বাকি অংশ দেখা হবে।
translations.TL: Ang pagpapatuloy ay sa susunod na pagkakataon.
translations.MY: ရှေ့တစ်ချက်မှာ ဆက်လက်ပြီးစီးပါမည်။
translations.FA: ادامه آن دفعه بعد خواهد بود.

flow.MY: ဆက်လက်မှု : ရေစီးကြောင်း
